name: Nuklear
description: Deals 50 damage, has 33% chance to clear all players' queue and cards in hand.

immediateEffect.script: DealDamage(Opponent, 50); if (Rng.Next(100) < 33) { while (PlayerQueue.Count > 0) { var c = PlayerQueue[0]; PlayerQueue.RemoveAt(0); PlayerDiscard.Add(c); } while (OpponentQueue.Count > 0) { var c = OpponentQueue[0]; OpponentQueue.RemoveAt(0); OpponentDiscard.Add(c); } while (PlayerHand.Count > 0) { var c = PlayerHand[0]; PlayerHand.RemoveAt(0); PlayerDiscard.Add(c); } while (OpponentHand.Count > 0) { var c = OpponentHand[0]; OpponentHand.RemoveAt(0); OpponentDiscard.Add(c); } Log("NUCLEAR FALLOUT! All queues and hands are cleared!"); }
